motifTestR: Perform Key Analyses on Transcription Factor Binding Motifs

Source: R/motifTestR.R
motifTestR-package.Rd

The package `motifTestR` has been designed for two primary analyses of TFBMs, testing for positional bias and overall enrichment.

Details

The package `motifTestR` provides two primary functions for testing TFBMs within a set of sequences

* [testMotifPos()] for detecting positional bias within a set of test sequences * [testMotifEnrich()] for testing overall enrichment of a TFBM within a set of test sequences

The main functions rely on lower-level functions such as:

* [countPwmMatches()] simply counts the number of matches within an `XStringSet` * [getPwmMatches()] returns the position of matches within an `XStringSet` * [makeRMRanges()] which produces a set of random, matching ranges based on key characteristics of the set of test sequences/ranges

A simple utility function is provided yo enable visualisation of results

* [plotMatchPos()] enables visualisation of the matches within a set of sequences using multiple strategies

See also

Useful links:

  • https://github.com/smped/motifTestR

  • Report bugs at https://github.com/smped/motifTestR/issues
